entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
